# Contributing

Contributions are welcome, and they are greatly appreciated! Every little bit helps, and credit will always be given.

## Bug Reports

If you find a bug, please create an issue on GitHub. Before creating an issue, please check if it has already been reported.

When reporting a bug, please include:
- Your operating system name and version.
- Any details about your local setup that might be helpful in troubleshooting.
- Detailed steps to reproduce the bug.

## Security Vulnerabilities

If you discover a security vulnerability, please send an e-mail to Eliel via `eliel_elie@hotmail.com`. All security vulnerabilities will be promptly addressed.

## Coding Standards

This project follows the PSR-12 coding standard and uses [Laravel Pint](https://laravel.com/docs/11.x/pint) for code style consistency.

You can run Pint before committing your changes:

```bash
./vendor/bin/pint
```

## Testing

This project uses [Pest PHP](https://pestphp.com/) for testing. Please ensure that all tests pass before submitting a pull request. You should also add tests for any new features or bug fixes.

To run the tests:

```bash
composer test
```

## Pull Request Process

1. Fork the repository.
2. Create a new branch for your feature or bug fix.
3. Commit your changes with descriptive commit messages.
4. Ensure all tests pass.
5. Submit a pull request to the `main` branch.

Please ensure your pull request includes:
- A clear description of the change.
- Any relevant issue numbers.
- New tests if applicable.
